resources.string: All the grades indicated on this section are encoded only by the corresponding teacher or instructor of every subject.\n\nFor grade-related concerns, you may discuss it with your teacher.
"Missing time, room number, or questionable subject periods?\n\nConfirm your class schedules through the Registrar's Office."
"For issues regarding the status of your subject list and units taken, proceed to the Registrar's Office to verify your information or you may report it using our in-app feedback page."
"To validate your balances, check with the Registrar's Office for clarification."
